channel.title: Lewk' and AMERIKA both should be banned from these forums perminently
channel.description:
or i could press charges. $700 worth of equipment, and hours worth of work down the drain because of moparscape members who think they r better than me and everyone ellse. this is why i hate rsps. this is who botted our site. I will have both of them found out sooner or later and i have friends working on this. think it's funny? well ban lewk and AMERIKA or i will see to it that you are shut down. do not take me lightly.

$700 worth of equipment, and hours worth of work down the drain because of moparscape members who think they r better than me and everyone ellse. this is why i hate rsps.
